thread.title: Judy Suzanne Reis Tsafrir
thread.title_full: TrustedHousesitters reviewed by Judy Suzanne Reis Tsafrir

author: Judy Suzanne Reis Tsafrir
title: Judy Suzanne Reis Tsafrir
text: This service has been a blessing for me. I am single and travel a great deal. I have a large Victorian home, and two dogs. I have used Trusted Housesitters three times with three different house/pet sitters. They were all wonderful. All were great and interesting people, smart, reliable and very loving to my dogs. They also took good care of my home. I had peace of mind going out of town, and my dogs were not disrupted by being placed in a kennel. They were cared for by people who are big animal lovers. This is one of the beauties and miracles of the internet. It allows people with mutual needs and interests to connect. I highly recommend this service.
